protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for the lysosphingolipid sphingosine 1- phosphate (S1P). S1P is a bioactive lysophospholipid that elicits diverse physiological effect on most types of cells and tissues. When expressed in rat HTC4 hepatoma cells, is capable of mediating S1P-induced cell proliferation and suppression of apoptosis

go_class.description: lysosphingolipid and lysophosphatidic acid receptor activity
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
